column4: Xlib: extension "GLX" missing on display ":0.0". Anyone know how to fix that error?
just ask your question... we don't know if we can help yet
oops I see your question above
what are you trying to accomplish... just installing new graphics drivers or something
yeah... your trying to get GLX and DRI working on your system... these are highly dependant upon the video card.
did you simply try installing the nvidia restricted drivers
you might simply need to modify the options line in your Xorg.conf file for GLX?
is there a line under the Section Module that says Load "glx" and Load "dri"?
I'll pastebin my file... if you have the restricted drivers installed then all of the sections relating to the display should work for you

yeah I read back... oh and please get in the habit of replying directly to the person your talking too... just put their name somewhere in your file so your comment gets highlighted.  TAB will complete if the name is just a pain to type.
in your file -> in your comment
much better... then I would have been able to scan the history much more quickly!  Actually I would have seen your comment through my transparent windows (I love compiz!)
the slow channels have the most knowledgeable people on the topic... but often it's hours before anyone replies or even talks in those channels... you need to be patient
